title: Tech, growth stocks lead Wall Street to lower close as investors focus on interest rates - Moneycontrol
content: Tech, growth stocks lead Wall Street to lower close as investors focus on interest rates  Moneycontrol
description: Developments in the Ukraine-Russia conflict added to investor caution as Russian and Ukrainian delegations held a fourth round of talks on Monday, but no progress was announced, while Russian forces allowed a first convoy of cars to escape Ukraine's besieged port of Mariupol.
